QuestData.Title: A Storm of Ill Tidings
QuestData.Description:
$n, we need to tell the Khanam Matra everything that's happened, including the capture of Ohn'ahra.
You must go to Maruukai as quickly as you can. You'll have to go alone. I was hurt in the fall, and I'd just slow you down.
Don't worry about me. I'll catch up later. Go!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver your report to the Khanam Matra in Maruukai.
QuestData.RewardText: This is dire news, $n, but we cannot lose focus. We are bruised but not beaten.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to the Khanam Matra at Maruukai
